title: Flute
description: A simple yellow flute made of bamboo, plastic, or metal.
apple_vendor_description: The flute emoji, as seen on Apple devices, presents a gleaming, polished silver instrument with a sophisticated, understated design. Its smooth gradients and subtle highlights evoke the elegant craftsmanship typical of Apple's object renderings, suggesting artistry and melody. This emoji is ideal for communicating themes of music, performance, or a love for classical and orchestral sounds within your messages on Apple devices.
